entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:40 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sept-Îles Airport 6:29 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
